panels.narration: pancake comes out of the pagan closet to his mother:

right.text: did you tell her you're also a furry yet? (and what a furry is)

left.text: well, my mom didn't throw me out for not loving jesus
"i worship a horned god i mean goat, mom"

right.text: "Honestly, this is probably the 4th or 5th time I planned to write something like this, but I always gave up. Ehn, it couldn't have gotten much more obvious. "

left.text: "Hmmm... you MAY HAVE SEEN THIS ONE COMING. I'm a pagan. I guess you can be shocked, but if you looked all all those drawings I did, it'd be pretty damn obvious."
